column3: Enables personal gear to be customized with the company crest.
Increases the number of company chest compartments to three.
Increases the variety of company crest designs.
Increases the maximum number of inactive and active company actions.
Enables the acquisition of land in residential districts.
Increases the number of company chest compartments to four.
Increases the maximum number of inactive company actions.
Increases the number of company chest compartments to five.
Increases the maximum number of inactive company actions.
Increases the maximum number of inactive company actions.
